recommendations: Sima Umathay “I have high respect for Arindam who is one among the top mentors I have been blessed with. Arindam's willingness to share his knowledge, ask straight forward questions and encourage right skills makes him indispensable. One incident I vividly remember is when I was working on a Product and he asked me tough questions which provided clarity and provided direction to proceed with understanding problem. I take this opportunity to thank him for his valuable time and insights during our conversations which has always been inspirational and full of practical ideas to act on. ”

Ravi Singla “Arindam is an exemplary product leader. I directly reported to him in Flipkart for 6 months or so when I was very new to product management. In such a short duration, he managed to leave a lasting impression on me. Arindam empowers his team by giving complete freedom to execute and guiding at the right time. He stays calm and composed even under the most high-pressure situations. He goes out of his way to help his team when needed. It was great working with him and I wish him all the best for future.”
